publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2256 Patrick Harvie: Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of the release of the four Britons still held in Guantanamo Bay and calls on the UK Government to release immediately the 11 detainees held without charge or trial in Belmarsh Prison under the Anti-Terrorism, Crime and Security Act 2001, an action which was condemned by the highest court in the land on 16 December 2004.

S2M-2256 Patrick Harvie: Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of the release of the four Britons still held in Guantanamo Bay and calls on the UK Government to release immediately the 11 detainees held without charge or trial in Belmarsh Prison under the Anti-Terrorism, Crime and Security Act 2001, an action which was condemned by the highest court in the land on 16 December 2004.
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Colin Fox*, Campbell Martin*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Mark Ballard*, Frances Curran*, Elaine Smith*, Alex Neil*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Ms Sandra White*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Robin Harper*, Robert Brown*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Chris Ballance*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-2256 Release of Guantanamo Bay Detainees (lodged on 13 January 2005) John Swinburne*
